page.title: 15School Log Book
page.content:
Our first school log book (Osmondthorpe Primary School) records school life from 1929 to 1956 and many events are recorded. They show us how our school has changed over the years. However, we have only chosen a few entries made between 1939 and 1945 all of which refer to the 2nd. World War. They tell us something about what life was like in our school at that time.
{29th.June 1939} I (E.M.Carratt) and two assistant teachers left school this afternoon to attend an air raid precaution meeting. {24th. July 1939 }Rehearsals for evcuation took place on the morning of the 20th. July and the afternoon of 23rd. July.
